description: Episode of Series "This Is Britain". Illustrates technical advances in the British motor-car industry showing the fine quality and workmanship of products manufactured. Cars shown include the following: Daimler Straight Eight, Rolls-Royce Silver Wraith, Morris Minor, Vauxhall Wyvern, Austin A40, Hillman Minx, Ford Prefect, Triumph Mayflower, Jaguar XK120 amd Mark VII Saloon, Ford Consul, Triumph Roadster, production version of the 2.1/2 litre Aston Marton, Bristol 401, and the experimental Rover Gas Turbine prototype.
